issues.description: The problem statement incorrectly refers to the PersonController methods as taking a Consumer<List<Note>>, but both the template and solution implementations use Consumer<List<Person>>. This mismatch between ‘Note’ and ‘Person’ in the generic type can confuse students when mapping the conceptual entity of persons to the method signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement to reference Consumer<List<Person>> instead of Consumer<List<Note>> for the PersonController methods to match the template and solution code.
